<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save a validation url and a secret to receive the Pix cash-in approval request."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/pix/payment/approval-endpoint"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this endpoint, to save a validation url and a secret to receive the Pix cash-in approval request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixPaymentRequestValidationEndpoint","description":"","required":["secret","validationUrl"],"type":"object","properties":{"secret":{"description":"The secret of validation url.","type":"string"},"validationUrl":{"description":"The validation url.","type":"string"}},"example":{"secret":"0123456789","validationUrl":"http://validationUrl.com.br"}},"examples":{"Example":{"value":{"validationUrl":"http://validationUrl.com.br","secret":"0123456789"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
